Open Digital Architecture - CanvasÂ¶

This contains documentation on the ODA environment specification, ODA reference implementation and canvas installation that are part of the Open Digital Architecture - Component Accelerator (ODA-CA) project. The ODA-CA is a reference implementation of the IG1171 Component Definition

  • Open Digital Architecture Canvas
